description: WorkManager work never executes because constraints never satisfied. Background tasks stuck pending.
commonCauses: BATTERY_NOT_LOW but device battery critically low
DEVICE_CHARGING but device never plugged in
Constraint too strict for realistic device usage
Work scheduled but device doze mode preventing execution
solutions: Use realistic constraints for your use case
Implement fallback for critical work without strict constraints
Use NETWORK_TYPE_NOT_REQUIRED if offline capability exists
Provide user feedback when work delayed by constraints
prevention: Test work execution under various device conditions
Monitor work state in production (ENQUEUED vs RUNNING)
Use expedited work for time-sensitive tasks
Implement constraint monitoring in debug builds
Test with battery saver and airplane mode
